channel.title: Music – Animals
channel.description: Recent content in Animals on Music

item.title: Animals - The House of The Rising Sun
item.description:
작곡: Sung by
KY: 1089

There is a house
in New Orleans
They call the
rising sun
And it’s been the ruin
of many a poor boy
And Go I know I’m one
My mother was a tailor
She sewed my
new blue jeans
My father was
a gamblin’ man
Down in
New Orleans
Now the only thing
a gambler needs
Is a suitcase
and a trunk
And the only time
he’ll be satisfied
Is when he’s all
a drunk

Oh mother
tell your children
Not to do
what I have done
spend your lives
in sin and misery
In the house
of the rising sun
Well I’ve got one
foot on the platform
The other
foot on the train
I’m going back to
New Orleans
To wear that ball
and chain
Well there is
a house in New Orleans
They call
the rising sun
And It’s been the ruin
of many a poor boy
And God I know
I’m one

item.title: Animals - Don't Bring Me Down
item.description:
작곡: The Animals / 작사: Words & Music by
KY: 8392

When you complain and
criticize
I feel I’m nothing
in your eyes
It makes me feel
like giving up
Because my best
just ain’t good enough
Girl I want to provide
for you
And do all the things
that you want me to
But oh oh no
don’t bring me down
I’m beggin you darlin’
oh oh no
Don’t bring me down
sacrifices I will make
I’m ready to give
as well as take
One thing I need is
your respect
One thing I can’t take
is your neglect
More than anything
I need your love
Then trouble are
easy to rise above
Oh oh no
don’t bring me down
Oh no no no no no
oh oh no
Don’t bring me
down-

You complain
and criticize
I feel I’m nothing
in your eyes
It makes me feel like
giving up
Because my best
just ain’t good enough
Girl I want to provide
for you
Do all the things
that you want me to
But oh oh no
don’t bring me down
No no no no no no
I’m beggin’ oh no
Don’t bring me down
oh no no baby please
Oh no no
don’t bring me down
I need
your tender lovin’
So please
don’t bring me down
Oh baby baby baby
don’t hurt me
Don’t bring me
down-

item.title: Animals - Don't Let Me Be Misunderstood
item.description:
작곡: B.B.Solmacus / 작사: Words & Music by
KY: 8053

Baby do you
understand me now
Sometimes
I feel a little mad
But don’t you know
that no one
Alive can always
be an angel
When things
go wrong
I feel real bad
I’m just a soul
Whose intentions
are good oh Lord
Please don’t let me
be misunderstood
Baby sometimes
I’m so carefree
With a joy
that’s hard to hide
And sometimes
it seems
That all I have
to do is worry
And then you’re bound
to see my other side
I’m just a soul whose
intentions are good
Oh Lord
please don’t let me
Be misunderstood
if I seem edgy
I want you to know
that I never
Mean to take it
out on you
Life has its problems
and I get my share
And that’s one thing
I never mean to do
Oh- don’t you know
I’m human I have
Thoughts like
any other one
Sometimes
I find myself
Lord regretting
some foolish thing
Some little simple
thing I’ve done
I’m just a soul whose
intentions are good
Oh Lord
please don’t let me
Be misunderstood
I’m just a soul
Whose intentions
are good
Oh Lord
please don’t let me
Be misunderstood
I’m just a soul
Whose intentions
are good-
